eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian

Class StreamingVariationalBayesVMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.StreamingVariationalBayesVMP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, ParameterLearningAlgorithm

    public class StreamingVariationalBayesVMP
extends java.lang.Object
implements BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm
    TODO By iterating several times over the data we can get better approximations. Trick. Initialize the Q's of the parameters variables with the final posterios in the previous iterations. Created by ana@cs.aau.dk on 04/03/15.
